verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become כִּשְׁמֹ֙עַ֙ <WH8085> heard הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And it came to pass when king חִזְקִיָּ֔הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah וַיִּקְרַ֖ע <WH7167> [it] that he rent אֶת־ <WH853> בְּגָדָ֑יו <WH899> his clothes וַיִּתְכַּ֣ס <WH3680> and covered בַּשָּׂ֔ק <WH8242> himself with sackcloth וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> and went בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַ֠יִּשְׁלַח <WH7971> And he sent אֶת־ <WH853> אֶלְיָקִ֨ים <WH471> Eliakim אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who עַל־ <WH5921> was over הַבַּ֜יִת <WH1004> who [was] over the household וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> שֶׁבְנָ֣א <WH7644> and Shebna הַסּוֹפֵ֗ר <WH5608> the scribe וְאֵת֙ <WH853> זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> and the elders הַכֹּהֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> of the priests מִתְכַּסִּ֖ים <WH3680> covered בַּשַּׂקִּ֑ים <WH8242> with sackcloth אֶל־ <WH413> to יְשַֽׁעְיָ֥הוּ <WH3470> unto Isaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אָמ֖וֹץ <WH531> of Amoz הַנָּבִֽיא׃ <WH5030> the prophet

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> And they said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> unto him Thus saith חִזְקִיָּ֔הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah יוֹם־ <WH3117> This day צָרָ֧ה <WH6869> of trouble וְתוֹכֵחָ֛ה <WH8433> and of rebuke וּנְאָצָ֖ה <WH5007> and of blasphemy הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> [is] a day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> This כִּ֣י <WH3588> for בָ֤אוּ <WH935> are come בָנִים֙ <WH1121> for the children עַד־ <WH5704> against מַשְׁבֵּ֔ר <WH4866> to the birth וְכֹ֥חַ <WH3581> and [there is] not strength אַ֖יִן <WH369> and there לְלֵדָֽה׃ <WH3205> to bring forth

אוּלַ֡י <WH194> Perhaps יִשְׁמַע֩ <WH8085> will hear יְהוָ֨ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <WH430> thy God אֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> the words רַב־ שָׁקֵ֗ה <WH7262> of Rabshakeh אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> whom שְׁלָח֨וֹ <WH7971> hath sent מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> whom the king אַשּׁ֤וּר ׀ <WH804> of Assyria אֲדֹנָיו֙ <WH113> his master לְחָרֵף֙ <WH2778> to reproach אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> God חַ֔י <WH2416> the living וְהוֹכִ֙יחַ֙ <WH3198> and will reprove בַּדְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which שָׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> hath heard יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God וְנָשָׂ֣אתָ <WH5375> wherefore lift up תְפִלָּ֔ה <WH8605> [thy] prayer בְּעַ֥ד <WH1157> for הַשְּׁאֵרִ֖ית <WH7611> for the remnant הַנִּמְצָאָֽה׃ <WH4672> that is left
וַיָּבֹ֗אוּ <WH935> came עַבְדֵ֛י <WH5650> So the servants הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> of king חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH2396> Hezekiah אֶל־ <WH413> to יְשַׁעְיָֽהוּ׃ <WH3470> to Isaiah

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH413> and יְשַֽׁעְיָ֔הוּ <WH3470> And Isaiah כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus תֹאמְר֖וּן <WH559> unto them Thus shall ye say אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲדֹנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH113> unto your master כֹּ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָא֙ <WH3372> Be not afraid מִפְּנֵ֤י <WH6440> of הַדְּבָרִים֙ <WH1697> the words אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which שָׁמַ֔עְתָּ <WH8085> that thou hast heard אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which גִּדְּפ֛וּ <WH1442> have blasphemed נַעֲרֵ֥י <WH5288> wherewith the servants מֶלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king אַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> of Assyria אוֹתִֽי׃ <WH853>

הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold נוֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> Behold I will send בּוֹ֙ ר֔וּחַ <WH7307> a blast וְשָׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> upon him and he shall hear שְׁמוּעָ֖ה <WH8052> a rumour וְשָׁ֣ב <WH7725> and return אֶל־ <WH413> to his אַרְצ֑וֹ <WH776> to his own land וְהִפַּלְתִּ֥יו <WH5307> and I will cause him to fall בַּחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> by the sword בְּאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <WH776> in his own land

וַיָּ֙שָׁב֙ <WH7725> returned רַב־ שָׁקֵ֔ה <WH7262> So Rabshakeh וַיִּמְצָא֙ <WH4672> and found אֶת־ <WH853> מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> of Assyria נִלְחָ֖ם <WH3898> warring עַל־ <WH5921> against לִבְנָ֑ה <WH3841> against Libnah כִּ֣י <WH3588> for שָׁמַ֔ע <WH8085> for he had heard כִּ֥י <WH3588> the king נָסַ֖ע <WH5265> that he was departed מִלָּכִֽישׁ׃ <WH3923> from Lachish

וַיִּשְׁמַ֗ע <WH8085> And he heard עַל־ <WH5921> concerning תִּרְהָ֤קָה <WH8640> concerning Tirhakah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king כּוּשׁ֙ <WH3568> of Ethiopia לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> say יָצָ֖א <WH3318> He is come forth לְהִלָּחֵ֣ם <WH3898> to make war אִתָּ֑ךְ <WH854> against וַיִּשְׁמַע֙ <WH8085> with thee And when he heard וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> [it] he sent מַלְאָכִ֔ים <WH4397> messengers אֶל־ <WH413> to חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH2396> to Hezekiah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

כֹּ֣ה <WH3541> Thus תֹאמְר֗וּן <WH559> Thus shall ye speak אֶל־ <WH413> to חִזְקִיָּ֤הוּ <WH2396> to Hezekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying אַל־ <WH408> nay יַשִּׁאֲךָ֣ <WH5377> deceive אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> Let not thy God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom אַתָּ֛ה <WH859> you בּוֹטֵ֥חַ <WH982> in whom thou trustest בּ֖וֹ לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> thee saying לֹ֤א <WH3808> not תִנָּתֵן֙ <WH5414> shall not be given יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> Jerusalem בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> into the hand מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king אַשּֽׁוּר׃ <WH804> of Assyria

הִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <WH2009> Behold אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you שָׁמַ֗עְתָּ <WH8085> Behold thou hast heard אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> what עָשׂ֜וּ <WH6213> have done מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> what the kings אַשּׁ֛וּר <WH804> of Assyria לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הָאֲרָצ֖וֹת <WH776> to all lands לְהַחֲרִימָ֑ם <WH2763> by destroying them utterly וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> and shalt תִּנָּצֵֽל׃ <WH5337> and shalt thou be delivered

הַהִצִּ֨ילוּ <WH5337> delivered אוֹתָ֜ם <WH853> אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> Have the gods הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> of the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הִשְׁחִ֣יתוּ <WH7843> have destroyed אֲבוֹתַ֔י <WH1> them which my fathers אֶת־ <WH853> גּוֹזָ֖ן <WH1470> [as] Gozan וְאֶת־ <WH853> חָרָ֑ן <WH2771> and Haran וְרֶ֥צֶף <WH7530> and Rezeph וּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> and the children עֶ֖דֶן <WH5729> of Eden אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who בִּתְלַשָּֽׂר׃ <WH8515> Telassar

אַיֵּ֤ה <WH346> Where מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Where [is] the king חֲמָת֙ <WH2574> of Hamath וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king אַרְפָּ֔ד <WH774> of Arphad וּמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king לָעִ֣יר <WH5892> of the city סְפַרְוָ֑יִם <WH5617> of Sepharvaim הֵנַ֖ע <WH2012> Hena וְעִוָּֽה׃ <WH5755> Ava

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> received חִזְקִיָּ֧הוּ <WH2396> And Hezekiah אֶת־ <WH853> הַסְּפָרִ֛ים <WH5612> the letter מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> from the hand הַמַּלְאָכִ֖ים <WH4397> of the messengers וַיִּקְרָאֵ֑הוּ <WH7121> and read וַיַּ֙עַל֙ <WH5927> went up בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> unto the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיִּפְרְשֵׂ֥הוּ <WH6566> and spread חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH2396> it and Hezekiah לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> it before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD
וַיִּתְפַּלֵּל֙ <WH6419> prayed חִזְקִיָּ֔הוּ <WH2396> And Hezekiah אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> O LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel יֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> that dwellest הַכְּרֻבִ֔ים <WH3742> [between] the cherubims אַתָּה־ <WH859> you ה֤וּא <WH1931> You הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> thou [art] the God לְבַדְּךָ֔ <WH905> alone לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> of all מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <WH4467> [even] thou alone of all the kingdoms הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You עָשִׂ֔יתָ <WH6213> thou hast made אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> heaven וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> and earth

הַטֵּ֨ה <WH5186> Incline יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> O LORD אָזְנְךָ֙ <WH241> thine ear וּֽשְׁמָ֔ע <WH8085> and hear פְּקַ֧ח <WH6491> open יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> O LORD עֵינֶ֖ךָ <WH5869> thine eyes וּרְאֵ֑ה <WH7200> and see וּשְׁמַ֗ע <WH8085> and hear אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> to all דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> all the words סַנְחֵרִ֔יב <WH5576> of Sennacherib אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who שָׁלַ֔ח <WH7971> which hath sent לְחָרֵ֖ף <WH2778> to reproach אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> God חָֽי׃ <WH2416> the living

אָמְנָ֖ם <WH551> Of a truth יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> LORD הֶחֱרִ֜יבוּ <WH2717> have laid waste מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> the kings אַשּׁ֛וּר <WH804> of Assyria אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאֲרָצ֖וֹת <WH776> all the nations וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצָֽם׃ <WH776> and their countries

וְנָתֹ֥ן <WH5414> And have cast אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֖ם <WH430> their gods בָּאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> into the fire כִּי֩ <WH3588> for לֹ֨א <WH3808> were not אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> for they [were] no gods הֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> like כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but מַעֲשֵׂ֧ה <WH4639> but the work יְדֵֽי־ <WH3027> hands אָדָ֛ם <WH120> of men's עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> wood וָאֶ֖בֶן <WH68> and stone וַֽיְאַבְּדֽוּם׃ <WH6> therefore they have destroyed

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Now therefore O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> our God הוֹשִׁיעֵ֖נוּ <WH3467> save מִיָד֑וֹ <WH3027> us from his hand וְיֵֽדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> may know כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <WH4467> that all the kingdoms הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that thou [art] the LORD לְבַדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH905> you alone

וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <WH7971> sent יְשַֽׁעְיָ֣הוּ <WH3470> Then Isaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אָמ֔וֹץ <WH531> of Amoz אֶל־ <WH413> about חִזְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH2396> unto Hezekiah לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> Because הִתְפַּלַּ֣לְתָּ <WH6419> Whereas thou hast prayed אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about אֶל־ <WH413> about סַנְחֵרִ֖יב <WH5576> to me against Sennacherib מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king אַשּֽׁוּר׃ <WH804> of Assyria

זֶ֣ה <WH2088> this הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> This [is] the word אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> hath spoken יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> against בָּזָ֨ה <WH959> hath despised לְךָ֜ לָעֲגָ֣ה <WH3932> thee [and] laughed thee to scorn לְךָ֗ בְּתוּלַת֙ <WH1330> concerning him The virgin בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> of Zion אַחֲרֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH310> at thee רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> her head הֵנִ֔יעָה <WH5128> hath shaken בַּ֖ת <WH1323> the daughter יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem

אֶת־ <WH853> מִ֤י <WH4310> Whom חֵרַ֙פְתָּ֙ <WH2778> Whom hast thou reproached וְגִדַּ֔פְתָּ <WH1442> and blasphemed וְעַל־ <WH5921> and מִ֖י <WH4310> whom הֲרִימ֣וֹתָה <WH7311> ? and against whom hast thou exalted קּ֑וֹל <WH6963> [thy] voice וַתִּשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> and lifted up מָר֛וֹם <WH4791> and haughtily עֵינֶ֖יךָ <WH5869> thine eyes אֶל־ <WH413> about קְד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> the Holy יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> By עֲבָדֶיךָ֮ <WH5650> thy servants חֵרַ֣פְתָּ ׀ <WH2778> hast thou reproached אֲדֹנָי֒ <WH136> the Lord וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and hast said בְּרֹ֥ב <WH7230> By the multitude רִכְבִּ֛י <WH7393> of my chariots אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I עָלִ֛יתִי <WH5927> am I come up מְר֥וֹם <WH4791> to the height הָרִ֖ים <WH2022> of the mountains יַרְכְּתֵ֣י <WH3411> to the sides לְבָנ֑וֹן <WH3844> of Lebanon וְאֶכְרֹ֞ת <WH3772> and I will cut down קוֹמַ֤ת <WH6967> the tall אֲרָזָיו֙ <WH730> cedars מִבְחַ֣ר <WH4005> thereof [and] the choice בְּרֹשָׁ֔יו <WH1265> fir trees וְאָבוֹא֙ <WH935> thereof and I will enter מְר֣וֹם <WH4791> into the height קִצּ֔וֹ <WH7093> of his border יַ֖עַר <WH3293> [and] the forest כַּרְמִלּֽוֹ׃ <WH3759> thickest

אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I קַ֖רְתִּי <WH6979> I have digged וְשָׁתִ֣יתִי <WH8354> and drunk מָ֑יִם <WH4325> water וְאַחְרִב֙ <WH2717> have I dried up בְּכַף־ <WH3709> and with the sole פְּעָמַ֔י <WH6471> of my feet כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> All יְאֹרֵ֥י <WH2975> all the rivers מָצֽוֹר׃ <WH4693> of the besieged places
